us.ihmc.euclid.geometry

Class Pose2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.Pose2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pose2DBasics, Pose2DReadOnly, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Clearable, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.EpsilonComparable<Pose2D>, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.GeometricallyComparable<Pose2D>, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.GeometryObject<Pose2D>, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Settable<Pose2D>, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Transformable

    public class Pose2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pose2DBasics, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.GeometryObject<Pose2D>
    A Pose2D represents a position and orientation in the XY-plane.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pose2D()
      Creates a new pose 2D initialized with its position at (0, 0) and orientation at 0.
      Pose2D(double x, double y, double yaw)
      Creates a new pose 2D and initializes it with the given parameters.
      Pose2D(Pose2DReadOnly other)
      Creates a new pose 2D and initializes it to other.
      Pose2D(Pose3DReadOnly pose3DReadOnly)
      Creates a new pose 2D and initializes it from pose3DReadOnly
      Pose2D(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Tuple2DReadOnly position, double yaw)
      Creates a new pose 2D and initializes it from the given position and yaw angle.
      Pose2D(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Tuple2DReadOnly position, Orientation2DReadOnly orientation)
      Creates a new pose 2D and initializes it with the given parameters.

              double y,
              double yaw)
        Creates a new pose 2D and initializes it with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the position.
        y - the y-coordinate of the position.
        yaw - the angle in radians for the orientation.

      • geometricallyEquals

        public boolean geometricallyEquals(Pose2D other,
                                   double epsilon)
        Compares this to other to determine if the two poses are geometrically similar.

        Two poses are geometrically equal if both their position and orientation are geometrically equal.

        Specified by:
        geometricallyEquals in interface us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.GeometricallyComparable<Pose2D>
        Parameters:
        other - the pose to compare to. Not modified.
        epsilon - the tolerance of the comparison.
        Returns:
        true if the two poses represent the same geometry, false otherwise.
